title: Instagram Fan Art Contest Spring 2021
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]


[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/instagram-fan-art-contest-spring-2021/banner3 style="width:100%;"]]

The SCP Foundation Wiki is known for the awesome stories, characters, and SCPs created by our wonderful authors. A more overlooked aspect of this community is the tons of fantastic artists that bring these creations to life. This contest is meant to promote these artists and give them a fun way to share their creations with the community.

+++++ Theme:

+++++ __Cosmic Creations__: Art featuring the far-out, space related, articles/characters/events/objects that exist within the SCP universe. 

**Earth isn't the only place in the universe that the Foundation's interested in. From titanic creatures swimming through the depths of space to entire civilizations lying in hibernation just below the surface of distant worlds, there's plenty of anomalies hidden among the stars.** 

------
++++ Rules:

* All art must be 100% original content created by the contestant. (Any stolen/plagiarised/traced media will lead to immediate disqualification and the submitter will be blocked from the page.)
* No memes. There is a good possibility that we will hold a meme contest in the future, but this is not that.
* Each contestant may only enter 1 submission.
* Contestants caught trash-talking or being overly rude on theirs or other contestant's posts will be disqualified.
------
++++ How to Enter:
* Pick an aspect of the SCP universe that fits the theme and create your fan art. (For example, just about everything in the [[[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/ad-astra-per-aspera-hub|Ad Astra Per Aspera]]] canon would work for this. If you're not sure what to draw, try delving through the [[[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/extraterrestrial#pages|extraterrestrial]]] tag for something that catches your fancy.) Art can be done on any medium, E.g: painting, digital, drawing, sculpture, animation, etc.
* Format your art for Instagram.
* From April 1st – April 19th submit your art via DM to the [https://www.instagram.com/scpfoundationwiki/ @scpfoundationwiki] Instagram account. (Your message should include your art, the character, Goi, scp, etc. depicted, and your username. If you'd like, a short one-sentence descriptor for your piece can be included.)
* From April 20th – April 25th each submission will be posted to the SCP Instagram account and the creator will be tagged. (To ensure fairness, entries will be posted in order of submission.)
* April 26th – May 6th voting will be done through Instagram likes.
* Wait for the results!
------
++++ Prizes:

The winners will be decided based on highest votes (likes), the TOP 4 submissions will each receive a prize:

__**4th Place**:__ A two-week-long shout-out (featuring art of your choosing) on the SCP Foundation Wiki's Instagram highlights.

__**3rd Place**:__ A two-week-long shout-out (featuring art of your choosing) on the SCP Foundation Wiki's Instagram highlights. As well as a Featured article post of your choosing in the month of May.

__**2nd Place**:__ A month-long shout-out (featuring art of your choosing) on the SCP Foundation Wiki's Instagram highlights. Each Saturday in May will feature an article or art post of your choosing.

__**1st Place**:__ A month-long shout-out (featuring art of your choosing) on the SCP Foundation Wiki's Instagram highlights. Each Sunday in May will feature an article or art post of your choosing. And the SCP Foundation Wiki Instagram account will use your featured art as its profile picture for the month of May.
------
++++ Important Dates:

**April 1st**: Contest submissions begin.

**April 19th**: Contest submissions close.

**April 20th**: Posting of entries begins, as well as voting.

**April 25th**: Posting ends.

**May 6th**: Voting period ends.

**May 7th**: Winners will be announced on the SCP Foundation Instagram.

**May 8th – June 8th**: Prize period.
@@ @@
------
If you have any questions regarding the contest feel free to DM the [https://www.instagram.com/scpfoundationwiki/ @scpfoundationwiki] Instagram page or Wikidot PM [[*user DrAkimoto]].
